data.title: Node.js Developer
data.subtitle: A fast-emerging platform making it easy for consumers to securely share their insurance data to companies they trust in seconds is looking for a Node.js Developer.
data.description:
The developer will be responsible for building back-end elements to manage the exchange of data between servers and users. The platform enables businesses to create a frictionless experience for their customers and reduce operational risk through better-informed decisions. This is an excellent opportunity to work with industry leaders on a revolutionary product.

Job Responsibilities:

  • Collaborate with front-end and back-end developers and designers to build the platform
  • Integrate server-side logic to the user-facing components
  • Identify programming bottlenecks and bugs and find fixes
  • Write clean, efficient, and reusable code

Job Requirements:

  • Bachelor‚Äôs/Master‚Äôs degree in Engineering, Computer Science (or equivalent experience)
  • At least 3+ years of relevant experience as a software developer
  • Proficiency in Node.js and AWS
  • Sound DevOps experience 
  • Nice to have experience in Serverless and AWS Lambda
  • Core data engineering skills 
  • Fluency in English

data.title: React Web Developer
data.subtitle: A U.S.-based company that is developing an innovative product to help businesses disrupt their industries and enter new markets, is looking for a React Web Developer.
data.description:
The selected candidate will be working closely with the CEO to make realistic projections with the team and make wise product management decisions. The company assists businesses in prioritizing insights and focusing more attention on issues and problem areas that actually mattered. This is a great opportunity for developers who are eager to learn and proactively seek clarification of the requirements.

Job Responsibilities:

  • Assist with business decisions by assisting in the technical evaluation of potential solutions and assisting in the decision to build or buy
  • To validate the use cases, create robust, testable code, and conduct unit, functional, acceptability, and/or user tests
  • When necessary, participate in quality assurance, and create test-driven code
  • Work with and help manage a junior front-end developer to help complete this project
  • Controlling technical debt
  • Set clear, well-commented code that is effective so that other developers may use it
  • Assess the trade-offs with the product manager
  • Instead of just meeting the technical requirements, consider the requirements from the perspective of the user and develop solutions.

Job Requirements:

  • Bachelor‚Äôs/Master‚Äôs degree in Engineering, Computer Science (or equivalent experience)
  • At least 3+ years of relevant experience as a software developer
  • Extensive experience working with React and Web technologies
  • Prolific experience with JavaScript Frameworks
  • Extensive experience with Figma for prototyping
  • Demonstrable experience working with TypeScript, HTML, CSS, and Relational databases
  • In-depth knowledge of REST APIs, Docker, and Heroku for continuous deployment
  • Strong understanding of Jest for testing and oAuth for authentication
  • Extensive experience with Role Based Access Control (RBAC), Material UI components, and Web Accessibility (AA standards)
  • Demonstrable experience working with Agile technologies
  • Fluent in spoken and written English

data.title: Senior Python Engineer
data.subtitle: A well-reputed, U.S.-based, leading fertility benefits management company that is redefining the benefits of fertility and family expansion is looking for a Senior Python Engineer.
data.description:
The engineer would be responsible for collaborating with cross-functional teams to support the development and maintenance of critical solutions. The company is on a mission to provide comprehensive and inclusive benefits to empower patients, reduce healthcare costs, and drive optimal clinical outcomes. This NASDAQ-listed company has managed to raise over $115 million so far and has served over 5.3 million members.

Job Responsibilities:

  • Analyze existing projects, solutions, and infrastructure to share insight on possible enhancements and structural improvements
  • Ensure continuous operation and improvement of engineering efforts by developing, maintaining, and optimizing pipelines and projects
  • Maintain, improve, scale, and automate existing systems and infrastructure
  • Ensure uptime and maintainability of existing code by debugging, tracing, and profiling it
  • Provide valuable insight on new products and pipelines
  • Collaborate with internal teams to create technical requirements and develop market-ready solutions
  • Communicate effectively with application developers, operational leadership, subject matter experts, and users, to understand current and future operational goals
  • Contribute to the entire lifecycle of software development and deployment, including design, development, documentation, testing, and operations

Job Requirements:

  • Bachelor‚Äôs/Master‚Äôs degree in Engineering, Computer Science (or equivalent experience)
  • At least 3+ years of relevant experience as a Python Engineer
  • Minimum 2+ years of working experience in Software Engineering or Web Development
  • Development and debugging expertise in Python, PHP, or similar programming languages
  • Familiar with Git and other remote services like GitHub for version control
  • Previous experience with MySQL or similar relational database systems
  • Familiarity and skills in Docker and AWS (or other cloud services)
  • Thorough understanding of CI/CD pipelines such as GitLab CI, Jenkins, and CircleCI
  • Experience developing and maintaining large-scale data ETL pipelines
  • Ability to assess, develop, troubleshoot, and enhance RESTful API systems to ensure development standards, performance optimization, increased scalability, and security
  • Understanding of project prioritization and designing for repeatability and scalability, 
  • Exude ownership and showcase great curiosity
  • Ability to translate business requirements into technical specifications
  • Great eye for detail and the drive to improve existing company projects and innovate new ones
  • Great to have previous experience with AWS Lambda or a similar serverless computing tool
  • Nice to have experience with NoSQL databases such as MongoDB
  • Experience in IaC tools such as Terraform or CloudFormation would be a plus
  • Effective communication skills, great with verbal and written English

Experience with testing such as unit or end-to-end testing is important in this role. The company is backed by top-tier venture capital firms and has raised over $200mn in funding so far. It is focused on providing top-performing agents and teams to elevate customers' experiences. This is a great opportunity to work with a nationwide company and grow rapidly. The role requires a minimum time zone overlap of 6 hours with PST.

Job Responsibilities:

  • Understand business requirements and collaborate with the product management team to turn user stories into technical plans
  • Communicate engineering constraints and objectives to the product team 
  • Evaluate and articulate end-to-end product designs for strengths and weaknesses (e.g., complexity, quality, scalability, latency, security, performance, data integrity, etc)
  • Identify tech debt and make futuristic recommendations for reduction
  • Uphold application performance and implement security best practices within the team
  • Write full suite of automated tests to ensure production stability (unit, integration, e2e) 
  • Independently write clean and readable code for medium to large features
  • Lead code reviews and provide constructive feedbacks
  • Mentor other engineers on the growth engineering team

Job Requirements:

  • Bachelor‚Äôs/Master‚Äôs degree in Computer Science (or equivalent experience)
  • 3+ Years of backend application development experience in Node.js and JavaScript 
  • Extensive experience in JavaScript and Node.js/ Express.js (or any Node.js HTTP framework)
  • Excellent working knowledge of PHP 
  • Strong unit, integration, and e2e testing experience 
  • Strong database experience on NoSQL and SQL 
  • Ability to mentor other engineers and act as a team player
  • Knowledge of GraphQL, Firebase, and WordPress is a plus 
  • Experience with Security best practices and open-source is nice to have

Headquartered in Palo Alto, California, we are a fully remote company of more than 600 people dedicated to helping connect the world's best remote software developers with the best companies.
